name: Soul Ring
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

descriptions.name: Sacrifice
descriptions.description: Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

notes: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
